numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows that younger generations were more optimistic.
2. Some people in Indonesia voted high on the air question.
4. These events might explain the high votes on the air question.
5. I wonder what the slope of the graph is.
6. I wonder what the line of symmetry of the graph is.
7. The slope of the graph may change how people view the graph.
8. The line of symmetry of the graph may change how people view the graph.
9. The graph shows optimistic views of current generations.
10. The graph shows pessimistic views of current generations.
